bibl.title: The Antigonids. Patterns of a Royal Economy.
bibl.note: See pp. 335-357: Hoard Patterns and Distributions (in part. on Ptolemaic precious metal issues in eastern Mediterranean hoards between c. 282 and 88 BC).
bibl.seg: PANAGOPOULOU Katerina, The Antigonids. Patterns of a Royal Economy.
Zofia H. ARCHIBALD, John K. DAVIES, Vincent GABRIELSEN and G.J. OLIVER (Edd.), Hellenistic Economies (London - New York, 2001) pp. 313-364, 8 tabl., 10 figg.
